title: Breville Presents Skillet Cornbread - "Mind of a Chef Techniques with Sean Brock"
description:
"Mind of a Chef Techniques with Sean Brock" is a video series that highlights the quintessential spirit of Chef Sean Brock's culinary ideas, themes, and techniques.

Southerners take their cornbread very, very seriously, and everyone has their own take. Lard, buttermilk, a lightly beaten egg and quality cornmeal are the main components of Sean's Skillet Cornbread.

asset.author: breville
asset.hookText:
For more about Breville, visit http://www.brevilleusa.com/

"Mind of a Chef Techniques with Sean Brock" is a video series that highlights the quintessential spirit of Chef Sean Brock's culinary ideas, themes, and techniques.

Southerners take their cornbread very, very seriously, and everyone has their own take.  Lard, buttermilk, a lightly beaten egg and quality cornmeal are the main components of Sean's Skillet Cornbread. 

Find this recipe here:
http://foodthinkers.com/2013/11/skillet-cornbread/
